mapper.sql: id, relationship_id, schema_id, entity_id, cardinality, port_at_relationship, port_at_entity
mapper.select: select id,relationship_id,schema_id,entity_id,cardinality,port_at_relationship,port_at_entity,is_delete,gmt_create,gmt_modified from relationship_edge where id = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into relationship_edge
relationshipID,
schemaID,
entityID,
cardinality,
portAtRelationship,
portAtEntity,
#{relationshipID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{schemaID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{entityID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{cardinality.code,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
#{portAtRelationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{portAtEntity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update relationship_edge set is_delete = 1 where id = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0

update relationship_edge
relationship_id = #{relationshipID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
schema_id = #{schemaID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
entity_id = #{entityID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cardinality = #{cardinality.code,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
port_at_relationship = #{portAtRelationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port_at_entity = #{portAtEntity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_delete = 0
